website_summaries.verdict: A large, Energy Star-compliant compact black refrigerator with 4.4 cubic feet of space that features adjustable wire shelves.
pros: This roomy unit has an 8-can beverage holder built into the door, yet it can also fit a 2-liter bottle
The cycle defrost keeps the refrigerator from freezing up while the reversible door and the vegetable crisper are two desirable additions
cons: The temperature inside this unit is not even and can vary a few degrees from shelf to shelf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for an office
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator has plenty of room. In our space, we don't need the freezer, and mini-fridges that have freezers are never that great, what's in the freezer isn't cold enough and they tend to frost things that are near them. The compartments are great, it has curves on the door shelfs so you can stick things in like cartons of milk or juice containers. The shelves are sturdy and I've got one shelf holding a 24-pack of water bottles without any problems. So far this has been a great fridge for us. I've included a picture that shows you how tall it is, when I was shopping I had no idea how tall it'd turn out.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compact refrig but the packaging is a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific compact refrig. Purchased for my wet bar. Will be used to store sodas, wine, bottled waters, and fresh fruits like lemons and limes. The unit is whisper quiet, well constructed, and has the ability to produce temperatures into the mid thirties per customer support. A perfect temperature for bar needs is around thirty-seven. The refrigerator has a strong light that illuminates the entire interior. My experience with one call to customer support is that CS is excellent. My only con is the heavy use of Styrofoam in the packaging. Using paper egg carton material product would be greener and provide the same protection as Styrofoam. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Peter DP

customer_reviews.title: Need better customer service from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Just took out of the box, looks great, only issue is, it only has 1 adjustable leg and it wobbles like crazy. Called manufacturer and there only suggestion was for me to buy another adjustable leg for the other front side of the refrigerator and see if that would work or stick something under it to help steady it. Not the type of customer service I was expecting, thought they would have at least have offered to send another adjustable leg. So now I have to buy the other leg and hope it works/helps with the server wobble. I won't be buying from Danby again nor recommend them to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use this because its door was too small & no matter how much the handyman tried, it kept falling off!! I tried Danby customer service and the wait time on hold varied from 24 minutes to 47. I am writing to warn anyone considering this brand that there is almost zero customer service so be prepared for frustration & getting nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: juliette

customer_reviews.title: Too variable for meat, too loud for living space
customer_reviews.text: This is a good refrigerator for keeping drinks cool in someplace like a garage or a basement. The unit does not keep a consistent temperature throughout the storage area and it is too loud to keep in a living space. I had intended this to be part of a small kitchenette area, but it will will have to go out in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great mini-fridge
customer_reviews.text: We were seeking a refrigerator without a freezer, and one that auto-defrosts. We have had over a month. The first one arrived dented, so, we had to order another one. The second one arrived (wrong color and dented, too -- a smaller dent), and we we couldn't wait to order another one, so we kept it. The fridge works as advertised. Very spacious for a small fridge, the auto defrost works well. We had to buy a thermometer to confirm the temp, as we use it in an AirBnB and don't want our guests turning it so low that it freezes -- as it WILL do. But, overall, I really like this fridge. Quiet and energy efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I'll just keep it.
customer_reviews.text: 1st order shipped the wrong refrigerator and then the second order was damaged on arrival. No damage to packaging but a large dent in the top/rear and one of the top corners. Frustrated that the item was twice incorrect/damaged but also tired of trying to ship back. Large item so I don't want to try to haul it and they won't pick up if no one is home. UPS only picks up when I am at work so I decided to keep the damaged item, hoping it is only cosmetic.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Terrible support and design problems
customer_reviews.text: Emailed support on 11/01/18 they advertise they would get back to me in one to two days. Called me on 11/08/18. Could hardly understand her accent. She had no answers. There is one adjustable leg I would have to put something under the stationary leg. Easily fixable with a screw leg. The thermostats has to be turned with a dime or something that fits into the slot. I have had good luck with their units before, but lost all confidence in them. Does not cool adequately.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: I would order again
customer_reviews.text: Nice little unit - taller than counter height - roomy - using as a second refrig for holidays and entertaining. Shelves are deep enough to easily accommodate 9 x 13 decorated cakes, casseroles, etc. The door storage is not a roomy as I had hoped - but the door storage seem to be built for "cans." Wish it were on wheels. All and all a fine little unit, reasonably priced, arrived as promised, well protected for shipping. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PamInSeattle

customer_reviews.title: WARNING NOT FROST FREE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this refrigerator SPECIFICALLY because it said it was frost-free. It IS NOT frost free. I am getting a build up of ice/fluffy white on the back panel. This deserves zero stars. FALSE ADVERTISING.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with multiple dents and missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived on time today. As I was positioning the box to open it, the bottom literally fell out of the box. (No biggie, just makes unpacking easier, right?) But as I proceeded to look at the item, I quickly noted 6 small dents on the side corners. I also discovered that one of the adjustable leg-caps for the front of the fridge was missing. Due to my urgent need to have a fridge installed, I decided to keep it despite the blemishes and missing leg cap. Hopefully the unit will perform well once plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I now have two of these
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased another one of the 4.4 cubic foot all refrigerator models. I bought the first one 3 years ago and have been very pleased. The refrigerator is very well built, looks great and most importantly to me you can't even hear it run. Love this "all refrigerator" model because I don't need a freezer and that makes much more room available inside. So now I have one for my beer and another for my soft drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Monty23

customer_reviews.title: I did not need a freezer so this unit was perfect. The unit was securely package
customer_reviews.text: I had a small refrigerator in my office and it was not big enough. I did not need a freezer so this unit was perfect. The unit was securely package. Almost too much but that was good. It holds a 12 pack of cans on the bottom and has can inserts in the door to hold a additional 8 cans. The shelves are adjustable so tall cans or bottles will fit. The door can be right or left side and it is very easy to do this yourself.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Giere

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but used?
customer_reviews.text: I like the nice big size. I am disabled, so i stay in my room for long periods of time. This big refrigerator allows me to have a variety of snacks and drinks. Along with some medications that need to be refrigerated. Wasn't happy about the mess that was in this "new" refrigerator. Looks like spilled chocolate icecream or cola. To hard for me to send back. Was advertised as new.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy House

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Came with a malfunction, dont buy, I tried to return this, but was told that they t can only be returned if I box it, Of course I don’t have original boxing my. So I’m stuck with a refrigerator that rattles, Which means the condenser is malfunctioning. I won’t buy a Danby product again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: PRO Roomy fridge, really appreciate the interior light and several potential configurations. Can fit a ton of beer. CON Doesn't get quite as cold as other, name-brand models. Legs don't have height adjusters, and my unit doesn't sit evenly on all 4's (the unit itself is uneven); I had to brace it with some wood. (-1 star)
customer_reviews.author: DJ_Blaxx

customer_reviews.title: Decent cooling and capacity, pretty quiet
customer_reviews.text: I wish it got things a little colder, but it's okay for soda, white wine, beer, and water. Oh, and it's pretty quiet. We have it in our family room downstairs, and when the tv is on, you can't hear it. When the tv is off, we can hear an on and off light gurgling that makes me think of rain trickling through our downspouts.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Swilling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. It was hard to find a nice sized fridge without a freezer ( because its a personal fridge and we have a freezer covered already) I took a star away because it came with an odd smell that I am so not fond of that I almost took away another star just for that. Other than that after a good cleaning it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Family

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is larger than the one I had. The smaller one, a Sanyo, is more than 20 years old, but just too small and probably uses a lot of electricity. This Danby will hold all my pop and water which I purchase at Sam's Club, where quantities are always large. As for the Sanyo, I gave it to someone who couldn't afford to buy a small fridge. All is good.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Not food safe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this thing for 4 days. And I’m highly disappointed. I’ve done some tracking of the temps and they fluctuate. Coldest it gets is 37.6 on the middle shelf, 37.4 on the bottom and 38.8 on the top. Once the compressor shuts off the temps start to rise. They top shelf goes above 42degs. The middle and bottom shelves hit 41. It’s not cold enough to get a can of pop chilled let alone keep food safe to eat! I’m going to return this hunk of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdy Hermit

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR, SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today in pristine condition. Extremely well-packed, inside and out. Started right up and cooling down as I write this. Looking forward to freeing up space in our kitchen fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dee

customer_reviews.title: I like the refrigerator except for the two  wire shelves
customer_reviews.text: I like the refrigerator. I Purchased this fridge instead of a beverage cooler to hold beverages. I really like the refrigerator. The cold setting works great. There is one drawback. It has wire shelving. I took care of that problem by purchasing these trays on Amazon. They will fit into the refrigerator nicely. Now, my bottles of water wont fall over.
customer_reviews.author: J.D

customer_reviews.title: Pay lower price for one with cosmetic damage, since it will get damaged anyway...
customer_reviews.text: I JUST unboxed this and there's damage from shipping on the back corner! Not happy. I know this is a good fridge because I use it at my work. I'm just not happy that it's already damaged
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B

customer_reviews.title: A Dandy Danby........
customer_reviews.text: I have had this fridge for a month and so far this fridge is cold. I had to turn the dial up from maximum because it was too cold. Great amount of space inside and the door trays are perfect. I keep water, soda, beer and condiments along with some lunch meats and left overs. This is the fridge. Love that without a useless freezer, i have a extra shelf of storage. A interior light. Nice touch. My unit is quite and does not amp up when on. Energy Star... As far as placement on a carpet. Why would you place a fridge on a carpet?
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect conversion fridge for kegerator
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mini fridge if you're looking to convert it into a kegerator. I watched a YouTube video using this model and took on the DIY challenge. This mini fridge has not been disappointing. It's able to fit all the space for my 20oz. Co2 tank (can probably hold a 5lb tank) in addition to my two 5 gallon ball lock kegs. I also have a double tap tower mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck McMahon

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't have asked for a better fridge for my use
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly as a kegerator. After reading many reviews and doing a lot of research I ended up going with this Danby unit. It fits a sixtel perfectly and leaves room for the co2 tank behind and a shelf. Even with the keg and co2 tank located in the fridge there is still room to leave the shelves on the door and fit a six pack of bottles on the bottom of the fridge. I couldn't have asked for a better fridge for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Zerbe

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product was damaged when we received it. My husband almost broke his back getting it up the stairs we don’t want to go through this again to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Drew

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy for Small Areas
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have owned a compact fridge so I wasn't sure what to expect. I am positively pleased with this little model. Since I bought the all fridge unit, I have plenty of space for everything. And it does stay very cold even at the medium setting. It is a little noisy for a few minutes when it revs up the power to keep the temperature stable, but this is not an issue unless you put it close to sleeping area. I would not disqualify this excellent compact unit for a little noise that tells me it is functioning properly.
customer_reviews.author: powergirl

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do:  Keeps food cold
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, came dented. Suggest you carefully remove from packing (rather than destroying the box in the process, as a certain family member did) so you can return it if yours is dented too. I'm knocking it down a star for the condition.
customer_reviews.author: Vermonter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator was exactly what I was looking for. It has plenty of room and I really like the water bottle holders in the door. I am happy with this purchase. I keep this upstairs to enable me to have cold beverages and snacks while working upstairs in my craft room and laundry room. It holds more than I expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great for homebrew fridge
customer_reviews.text: This fridge fits 2 ball lock kegs a 5lbs co2 tank with double regulator and still able to have the can rack on the door. It does NOT have the refrigerant lines in the top, so it's easy to add a faucet tower without turning your fridge into junk.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Good Value No Freezer
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Quiet. Great for the garage. There is a lot of box, styrafoam, and inner box to recycle, but it arrived on time and runs good. No need to extend warranty... It has a year and a half from the manufacturer. At this price point, if it lasts more than two years you get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy V.

customer_reviews.title: Could run colder
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could get the temperature down from 43 to 38 degrees like its big brother in the kitchen, but otherwise everything is just fine. UPDATE: It's been chilling at 39 degrees for several weeks now. I'd call that close enough to perfect.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bruce Magee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for drinks and no freezer inside
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for our water and soda and G2 gatorade however the outside does seem a bit hotter than our old one. The best part is there is not freezer inside. This is for our drinks only and the other one we had we kept having to defrost it. That is now a thing of the past. It gets only 4 stars due to the sides being more hot than our old compact fridge, and thus will heat up the room more. However, we are pretty happy with it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck & Karen

customer_reviews.title: Danby Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: The Danby Refrigerator was purchased as a gift for my wife to replace her older office refrigerator freezer. There was some confusion with delivery dates and times, however, it still arrived in plenty of time for the gift presentation. The refrigerator is working very good so far and my wife likes the extra space not having to mess with the little freezer compartment freezing up all the time like her old one did. All in all, esxcept for the confusion with delivery, tracking, and arrival time, we are pleased with this purchase and if all goes well for several more months, we may purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Jim

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep very cool
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra refrigeration space during the holidays, thought this would fit the bill. Cranked up to the coldest setting this unit hovers between 40 and 42 degrees. I don't trust meats, dairy etc at that temperature, so I keep drinks in the refrigerator. I paid $170 for a cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact refrigerator. I did not need a freezer compartment which leaves more room for other items I need to keep cold. I use it in my office and store lunch (or left overs) and beverages great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Value and Performance
customer_reviews.text: Unit was well packaged and arrived without incident. I use this in my office; plenty of interior space; I do hear the unit on occasion, but overall very happy with the noise level.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY WITH NEW DANBY UNIT.
customer_reviews.text: I had a unit for 15 years...it worked great, but the motor shorted out. The new unit, tho not stainless like the old one, is doing very well. One issue was the heat in the side walls when the condensor/compressor was starting up. It concerned me, but that heating is over. I would recommend a refrigerator only for use. Ours is on the counter of our bar area. Not recommended to be put in a cabinet...it needs air circulation. I would recommend this to any friend.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great little refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Love the refrigerator. Really like it because NO freezer unit, means more shelf space... Comes in handy for drinks on the porch of our lake house. This is a replacement for the one we bought in August, 2014. The motor just stopped working. The lights were on, but nothing else. Don't know if it was because of the hot/cold weather in East Texas or not since it went through two years of both kinds.
customer_reviews.author: RMF

customer_reviews.title: All fridge means no defrost
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a couple Mr Beer kegs, and with this and an Inkbird thermostat I am able to have both kegs chilling without getting cold. Especially nice is that without the freezer you not only have room for more stuff, but you don't have to worry about defrosting.
customer_reviews.author: Ewan Grantham

customer_reviews.title: Dented of Course !!
customer_reviews.text: The refrig arrived a day early and appears to be working fine. However, the door and right back corner were dented in three places. The refrig is obviously packed with inadequate cushioning material. The carton is two thicknesses of corrugated cardboard lined with 3/8" of foam. Based on all the complaints by purchasers about receiving the refrig dented you would think the manufacturer would improve the packing!!
customer_reviews.author: Leon Russell

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room and no defrosting!
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator arrived very promptly and in perfect condition. I love that is doesn't have one of those little "freezers" they put in most compact refrigerators. They never work right anyway and build up ice like crazy. The absence of the freezer also means no defrosting and more room! There is a LOT of room in here and I like the door storage. All in all I am very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: carrie britcher

customer_reviews.title: and it has worked just fine since.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this fridge as it had no freezer compartment, and thus should (and does) work well as a corny keg (homebrew) beer fridge. Delicious results have ensued. Did not modify fridge (other than removing shelves) to fit a 5-gallon Cornelius ball-lock keg and small CO2 bottle within. Soda can pockets along the door hinge line work well (other than the topmost one) for standard pint glasses, a plus in my opinion. Unit arrived in dual-box packaging with extra Styrofoam padding, no damage whatsoever to the fridge exterior. Waited 12 hours after arrival to plug it in, and it has worked just fine since.
customer_reviews.author: BenT

customer_reviews.title: Okay product, but dented/damaged in handling or shipment
customer_reviews.text: So far, the little refrigerator works fine. However, the rear of the case was damaged, but the packaging didn't appear punctured. If it had been purchased in store, I would have expected a discount as dented/damaged item. Accordingly, the delivered product gets a mediocre review.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mini
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me and what I needed I was expecting a freezer in it nut oh well I didn't need one anyway good looking and well made and sent in original box inside of layers of Styrofoam and another box lots of boxes and styrofoam when you get this item which is good I don't care in pristine condition no dance nothing broken or anything
customer_reviews.author: jeremy brooks

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Never did work. Couldn't get it below 45. Customer service useless. I am stuck with a refrigerator that they have my money and I have something that belongs in the trash. I am just out of the money. Please do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Killen

customer_reviews.title: Damaged from manufacturer twice, shipping boxes were fine.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even plugged the fridge in, first order arrived severely dented. Replacement order arrived somewhat dented. Paid a pretty penny for this, would have liked an undamaged fascia. Giving up on sending it back for a new one since my old mini fridge is next to dead. Hoping it runs fine, but I think they should be more upfront that these are factory seconds rather than prime products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice addition to this household ... very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: It was bought to replace one, just like it, that we had bought a few years ago from Costco. The first had the stainless steel door, this one is black. It seems to be an improvement in design ... anyway, we are quite pleased... and pleased also that we could order it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: N. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I like this refrigerators interior configuration
customer_reviews.text: I like this refrigerators interior configuration. I had this model previously. The only problem is that it had two dents in the back/side. Thankfully, it works and the dents are not visible from the front. the refrigerator was supposed to be shipped upright but was found on my front door on its' side. You need a better shipper.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pullar

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it. First one that came was broken but ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed it. First one that came was broken but received a replacement however it took about 3-4 weeks to finally receive the new one. Beside that, the refrigerator cools really well. Keeps my drinks cold. Keeps the vegetables crisp. Ive had it for a month or so now and still no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Miramontes Jr

customer_reviews.title: Will not cool below 42 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Will not cool below 42 degrees. Never gets cool enough to store dairy, even after repair folks replaced thermostat. Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Local Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great for kegorator conversion.
customer_reviews.text: Considering Amazon 2 day shipped this huge box to my doorstep for less than what I could have ordered it from home depot. There is no way I couldn't five star it. I use it as a kegorator. A sixth barrel keg and C02 tank with regulator fit in it fine. Keeps the beer cold and me happy.
customer_reviews.author: BO12

customer_reviews.title: Mini Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: So glad we ordered this mini refrigerator. It comes in handy to keep our drinks cold, especially in the summer months. It choice this refrigerator because of the amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis M. Neave

customer_reviews.title: Didint work out if the box.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of the box. Leveled it, plugged it in, sent temp, went to work. 12 hours later when I returned it was noticeably warm. Reset it and gave it an additional 12 hours. Still doesn't work. What a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Look for solid shelves
customer_reviews.text: I have had the fridge for about 3 months. It works great keeping the beer cold. I would look for a model with solid shelves, mine has wire racks and beer bottles want to fall over as the wire in the racks is not close enough together. I am going to look at making some custom shelves for it. I lost a beer when it fell and hit the garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: John VanDriessche

customer_reviews.title: Nice supplimental Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: We raise chickens and needed an extra fridge for the eggs we collect. This one had the best cubic feet for the price. I wanted one without a freezer too. It functions very well and looks nice in the corner of my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: SpinningKat

customer_reviews.title: You'll never miss the freezer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fridge. Not crazy about the can holders on the door, I would have preferred shelves. The loss of the freezer increases the overall usage of the unit so that I don't mind the can holders as much. I just put whatever jars or bottles that fit in the can holders. Use this mostly for beverages over the summer but comes in handy over the holidays for extra fridge space.
customer_reviews.author: NurseSteph

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, No Freezor to defrost!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third purchase of the same fridge. One is on patio used for beverages (personal purchase). One in the office. This purchase also went to the office. Spacious, NO Ice Area to freeze up and need defrosting, lots of room. Quality product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! These refrigerators have coils in the sides and back!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! Don't learn this the way I did. These refrigerators have coils in the sides and back! If you try to drill a hole for your gas line you will ruin it. Other than that it holds a 5 gallon corny keg perfectly, even room for a gas cylinder and regulator (inside!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR FOOD!
customer_reviews.text: This refridgerator only gets to 42 degrees (32-40 degrees is the "safe" zone for food) after it has been running at the lowest setting with the door shut for 24 hours. Once you open the door it quickly shoots up to 47 within seconds. I wish this was advertised as a"BEVERAGE" fridge, so would not have wasted my time. If you need a beer/drink fridge, this will do. For anything else... stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you don't need a freezer compartment
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Only problem was one of the feet would not adjust. Stuck a piece of cardboard under it to level it out.
customer_reviews.author: NickNC100

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY REFRIGERATOR
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE REFRIGERATOR FOR THE PRICE. WANTED A SMALL REFRIGERATOR WITHOUT A FREEZER, AND THIS FITS THE BILL.
customer_reviews.author: HANDYWOMAN

customer_reviews.title: A Huge Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little refrigerator. We are extremely pleased with everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: shoremama

customer_reviews.title: This refrigerator is great! We had a specific spot to fill when ...
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator is great! We had a specific spot to fill when the old fridge died, this one fit perfectly with much more internal space. The delivery was efficient and this would be a five star review if I hadn't found the same fridge a week later at Costco for $50.00 less. Oh well, still a great looking/working unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but received damaged.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working fine. It did arrive with a dent in it. Since it will be in our garage we went head and started using it. The actual box was not damaged only the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: pjjelle

customer_reviews.title: Wow this was delivered 2 days after I ordered it ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow this was delivered 2 days after I ordered it. Works incredibly well and was surprised the can holder on the side actually holds larger 16 oz cans as well. There was a minor scratch on the door when I got it. I could have probably gotten a different one, but it's hardly noticeable and will problably get small scratches anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Britney Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Quit working. Danby has TERRIBLE customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my mom. She loves it. Is happy that it is frost free! ****Less than a year later it quit working. Had a terrible time getting a refund. Danby expected my elderly mother to return the fridge. They made her take several pictures of the fridge and identifying info. After many emails back and forth, they instructed her to cut the cord off and send them a photo of that. Finally, Amazon stepped in and we got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Has worked perfectly for keeping our beverages cold and out ...
customer_reviews.text: Has worked perfectly for keeping our beverages cold and out of the main frig. No more bags and bags of ice for the coolers to hold beverages at party time . It should also work well for brining large pieces of meat .
customer_reviews.author: Larry F.

customer_reviews.title: No freezer
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and big. I luv it. No freezer in the way makes for more room.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job well
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to do. Arrived with a small dent on the side but it doesn't seem to affect it and doesn't really bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Refrigerator. It keeps the soda nice and cold
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Refrigerator. It keeps the soda nice and cold. It arrived packaged well with no dents or other issues. There's also plenty of room inside. Second and third shelf each fits 24 cans of coke for a total of 48. You can also put around 16 more, (guess since I'm using the top shelf for bottles of water) on the top shelf. The middle of the top shelf though has a light which keeps it from being able to put cans in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I needed something to keep all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I needed something to keep all the drinks left over from the 4th of July party cold. Now it sits in my dining room as a beverage refridgerator. Convenient for grabbing a quick cold drink and freed up a ton of space in my main fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Minion

customer_reviews.title: Does not cool down enough ...
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator looks great, arrived in good order, but does not cool down enough. I've tried checking the instructions but all it states is to turn the temperatures dial which I did and still it barely gets cold. I see a lot of condensation on the back but again does not cool down enough to keep the food at a low 36 - 40 F. Even drinks are not getting cold. Not sure if that is all its capable of doing but I've owned other mini refrigerators and they better.
customer_reviews.author: George Mosqueda

customer_reviews.title: Product Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived left at my door with damage evidencing droppage. One Rear Corner Protector is damaged and the other missing. The packing slip was missing, obviously cut out. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: isaac Don Brown, III

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I love this small fridge! We needed some extra fridge space, and didn't need another full size refrigerator. This keeps everything nice and cool where it should be, and this is very nice looking as well. There's lots of shelf space. I'd recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this product..... ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this product.....I don't feel it keeps cold enough....I don't open the door hardly ever and it is just not cold enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it runs great still after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a refrigerator this size with no freezer. We installed at work, and it runs great still after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Ehrhardt

customer_reviews.title: and the warrantee and the quality of workmanship is great. But lwe have had it for a week ...
customer_reviews.text: I give it five stars because it is working as advertised. It arrived on time, and the warrantee and the quality of workmanship is great. But lwe have had it for a week and so far it has delivered as promised. Yes I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Roy D. Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandaughter. Room on 3rd level. Helps her to not have to go down just for a glass of water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I put this in our barn for easy access to soft drinks and water
customer_reviews.text: I put this in our barn for easy access to soft drinks and water. So far it's exceeded my expectations. Now if I just had a toilet in the barn, there would be very little reason to go to the house.
customer_reviews.author: t-rod

customer_reviews.title: Good fridge for turning into a kegerator
customer_reviews.text: Good fridge for turning into a kegerator, but unlike the 440BL, you cannot screw off the door panel. I had to use my angle grinder to get the panel off, then epoxy a sheet of acrylic to make space for two home brew kegs. I probably would have returned this had I not already cut a hole in the top for the draft tower.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Willett

customer_reviews.title: 2 corny kegerator
customer_reviews.text: I converted it into a 2, 5gal corny kegerator. It just barely fits 2 kegs and 5lb tank if you cut the door shelf out.
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra needed fridge space
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a mini-fridge without a freezer so we could maximize the use of the fridge-function. This is perfect for my husband who decided to start home-brewing beer. It's fairly quiet and just the right size for those beer bottles!
customer_reviews.author: SMASEA65

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Simple and efficient. Good amount of space. Love not having useless freezer!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great little fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great little fridge. Ten times quieter than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: eVictor54

customer_reviews.title: Man Cave Requirement
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a “man cave/garage”. Like the fact there is no freezer. Provides more space for beverages. Good price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Unit arrived promptly. 3 star because the inside cooling ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived promptly. 3 star because the inside cooling plate was completely broken off its mounts and hanging by the feed hose. I cut a piece of styrofoam to keep it in place. We'll see if it works.
customer_reviews.author: Turtletraxx

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. Got it to fit under a counter in tv room and it worked. Chose one without a freezer because using it mainly for drinks and snacks
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend! The door does not even want to close!
customer_reviews.text: Item come damage and dented. Also the door does not want to remain closed
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Home Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store drinks and milk, occasionally fruits. It frees the fridge in the kitchen, and always have plenty of cold beers and chilled wine glass, love it
customer_reviews.author: CATSEYE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've had this product for ~6 months and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Thresher

customer_reviews.title: Great very cold fridge that makes a decent kegerator (2 tap)
customer_reviews.text: Very nice very cold fridge. I turned it into a 2 tap Kegerator. I had to cut the shelves off the door to do so, which was easy. It has room (very snug) for 2 ball lock kegs, the lines, regulator, and 5 lbs co2. If it lasts it will be worth the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: R. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Goods!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment to receive a product in this damaged condition! Fridge has several dents in the back and is missing a piece on the bottom causing it to be unsteady.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase the only reason I give it 4 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase the only reason I give it 4 stars out of 5 is because this refrigerator could get a bit noisy at times. Other than that the refrigerator is doing a great job 2 months into me getting it.....
customer_reviews.author: Juanito69

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Like the layout, but door will not close unless you elevate the front more than what the base has from factory. We have kids and unless we have a pretty steep pitch, the door will remain about 1/2 open.
customer_reviews.author: TerryB

customer_reviews.title: annoying high pitch buzzing sound
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this would be a good unit. I regret buying. There is a high pitched buzzing sound that comes and goes. Disappointing....
customer_reviews.author: Melanie West

customer_reviews.title: Happy Danby
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this frige so far ! Let er sit for about 4 hours after shipment, plugged it in ,made sure it was level and bang cold drinks ever since!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Allen Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great little fridge
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Cold, quiet, great interior light, no frost buildup. Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Won't go below 40 degrees
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is a piece of junk. Won't go below 40 degrees. Can't store food in there as 40 degrees is unsafe for perishables. Contacted Danby May 1st and have had zero response from their "customer service". I would not recommend any Danby product. They don't stand behind their own junk products. AVOID
customer_reviews.author: The Hammill Family

product_meta.title: Danby Designer 4.4 Cubic Feet Compact Refrigerator (DAR044A4BDD-3) Black
product_meta.description:
Forget running to the kitchen, enjoy the convenience of chilled beverages where they're needed most with our Energy Star rated Danby Designer compact all fridge. Boasting a generous capacity of 4.4 cu. ft. this counter high model is an efficient way to supplement your refrigerator. It includes our Canstor beverage dispenser, reversible door hinge and interior light.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
There’s no need to wear out a path to the kitchen every time you’re in the mood for a refreshing drink or snack. This compact, counter-high fridge by Danby is the ideal solution since it’s a perfect fit for any room in your home. It boasts a generous 4.4 cubic feet of cooling capacity and is outfitted with the popular CanStor beverage dispenser. Your electricity costs will be reduced due to the Energy-Star rating and highly-efficient mechanical thermostat. It uses environmentally friendly R600a refrigerant to cool the interior. The black finish is easy to clean since it won’t smudge and the cycle defrosting system keeps it from freezing up. This spacious model offers two-and-a-half slide-out glass shelves along with a full-width door shelf and a pair of three-quarter-width door shelves for maximum storage room. There’s an attractive and functional clear vegetable crisper and cover inside along with a bright interior light for easy viewing. The integrated door handle ensures easy opening and the reversible door swing means it can be adjusted for either left or right-handed use. This stunning appliance also comes with 18-months coverage on parts and labor.
feature_bullets: 4.4 cu. ft. (124 L) capacity compact all fridge.
Energy Star compliant. Environmentally friendly R600a refrigerant. Automatic defrost.
2 full width and 1 - 1/2 width adjustable wire shelves. Integrated door shelving with tall bottle storage. CanStor beverage dispensing system.
Integrated door handle. Reversible door hinge.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars345 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
